title: Suspended account for chargeback
body: * I've been suspended for a charge back, well I understand why but I've been trying to pay by PayPal since I cant pay by gift cards. But PayPal isn't working for this and I don't know why. Please find a fix to this, I really need to just repay Riot, but I can't due to technical difficulties, please find a way for me. If there would be an easier way if I get unsuspended and just go on and ban my RP buying, besides I just used like 75 dollars, unlike other people who have used 400+

replies.body: We have a website setup for our NA players to pay back those chargebacks pretty quickly and easily! You'll have the gift card option as well as the Paypal option on our [**Riot Repayments**](https://repay.leagueoflegends.com/) website, and those payments process almost instantly I believe as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2gbyqK2y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-12T04:39:24.086+0000)
>
> We have a website setup for our NA players to pay back those chargebacks pretty quickly and easily! You'll have the gift card option as well as the Paypal option on our [**Riot Repayments**](https://repay.leagueoflegends.com/) website, and those payments process almost instantly I believe as well.

I have my own PayPal account, and I tried using PayPal but it keeps saying 

Sorry, we can’t complete your purchase at this time
Please return to the merchant and choose another way to pay.

I can't use gift cards either.

Well that's no good, is it? Let's have you go ahead and shoot our billing team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can get things straightened out for you. They'll be able to get the payments running again for you, or will be able to take the payment in your ticket.

I was just wondering if I am able to redeem my account even after the dispute if I wasn't able to pay in the 14 day grace period, I was also wondering about this one thing , it was mentioned a permanent suspension is different from a temporary one but in my League of Legends client it popped up a "Permanent Suspension" but I only had it because of a Chargeback

Hmmmmm I'm not sure what this 14 day grace period is, but you'll be able to repay that at any point in time. 

The "permanent" suspension is worded a little oddly I suppose. It's referred to as permanent since it will not lift automatically. Certain suspensions remove themselves after a certain amount of time, but this one will be in place until the payment is received.
Thanks for the reply, I'll pay it as soon as possible. ☝️
